Firstly, if you enjoyed the depth and complexity of "The Rock", I'd highly recommend "The Bell Jar". This classic drama is a powerful exploration of mental health, identity, and societal pressures, all set against the backdrop of 1950s America. With its thought-provoking themes and poignant performances, it's a must-see for anyone looking for a cinematic experience that lingers long after the credits roll.

If you're in the mood for something more light-hearted and humorous, I think "Out of Sight" could be just the ticket! This 90s crime-comedy has it all: witty banter, charming characters, and a healthy dose of rock 'n' roll. With an all-star cast including George Clooney and Jennifer Lopez, you can't go wrong!
